welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bayan Lepas, Malaysia! This charming city is known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bayan Lepas has to offer.

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Bayan Lepas.
restaurants.address: Setia Tri-Angle, Persiaran Kelicap, 11900 Bayan Lepas, Pulau Pinang

restaurants.name: Bawal Goreng Pokok Cheri
restaurants.description: Bawal Goreng Pokok Cheri is a malay restaurant located in Bayan Lepas.
restaurants.address: Jalan Mahkamah, 11950 Bayan Lepas, Pulau Pinang

restaurants.name: Nasi Dalca Briyani
restaurants.description: Nasi Dalca Briyani is a malay restaurant located in Bayan Lepas.

restaurants.name: Fizzy Cafe Mee Udang Ketam

restaurants.name: Kapitan Restaurant

restaurants.address: 21 Persiaran Kelicap, 11900 Bayan Lepas, Pulau Pinang

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Penang International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Low Cost Carrier Terminal
terminals.description: The Low Cost Carrier Terminal at Penang International Airport is dedicated to budget airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport with a free 2-hour usage limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Butterworth Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Butterworth Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
